name: Technical Core
description: Analysis of site infrastructure, crawlability, and schema implementation.
insights: Site speed is excellent (98/100 mobile).
SSL configuration is valid and secure.
Robots.txt is correctly configured for AI bots.
Sitemap.xml is up-to-date and accessible.

name: Content Quality
description: Evaluation of content depth, relevance, semantic richness, and uniqueness.
insights: Blog content is well-structured with clear headers.
Semantic entity density is good in top-tier pages.
Duplicate content detected across multiple regional subdomains.

issues.title: Thin Content on Product Pages
issues.description: 25% of product pages have less than 300 words of unique description, limiting semantic depth.

issues.title: Missing Alt Text
issues.description: Several images on the homepage lack descriptive alt text for accessibility and SEO.

recommendations.title: Enhance Product Descriptions
recommendations.description: Add detailed feature lists, use cases, and FAQ sections to product pages to increase entity depth.

recommendations.title: Consolidate Regional Content
recommendations.description: Implement canonical tags for regional pages with identical content to prevent dilution.

name: AI Visibility
description: How well Large Language Models (LLMs) understand and retrieve your brand entity.
insights: Brand is correctly recognized by GPT-4 and Claude 3.
Gemini 1.5 fails to associate the brand with 'Enterprise Solutions'.
Key executive entities are disconnected from the brand graph.

issues.title: Missing Entity Associations
issues.description: LLMs do not reliably associate 'Kasparro' with 'AI SEO' or 'Brand Intelligence' in zero-shot prompts.

issues.title: Hallucinated Pricing
issues.description: GPT-4 frequently hallucinates incorrect pricing tiers for the Enterprise plan.

recommendations.title: Optimize About Page for Entities
recommendations.description: Add structured data (Organization schema) and clear, defining statements about core offerings to the About page.

recommendations.title: Publish Pricing Clarity
recommendations.description: Create a clear, publicly accessible pricing or 'contact for pricing' page to ground LLM knowledge.

name: Trust & EEAT
description: Analysis of Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals.
insights: Strong author bios present for all blog posts.
Privacy policy and Terms of Service are easily accessible.
HTTPS is enforced globally.

issues.title: Missing Social Proof
issues.description: Homepage lacks visible customer testimonials or case study links above the fold.

recommendations.title: Add Verified Reviews
recommendations.description: Embed third-party verified reviews (e.g., G2, Capterra) on the pricing and landing pages.

name: Competitor Gap
description: Benchmarking entity dominance against top 3 industry leaders.
insights: Competitor A dominates 'Generative Search' queries.
Competitor B has significantly higher backlink velocity.
Your brand leads in 'Technical Audit' related queries.

recommendations.title: Target 'Generative Search' Topic
recommendations.description: Create a pillar page dedicated to Generative Search to erode Competitor A's dominance.

name: Local Presence
description: Visibility in local search results and map packs.
insights: Google Business Profile is claimed and verified.
NAP (Name, Address, Phone) consistency is 100% across directories.
Positive review sentiment in local listings.

name: User Experience
description: Core Web Vitals, accessibility, and engagement metrics.
insights: LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) is within green limits.
Mobile responsiveness is generally good.

issues.title: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
issues.description: Significant layout shifts detected on blog post load due to dynamic ad insertion.

issues.title: Contrast Ratio Issues
issues.description: Footer links have insufficient color contrast against the dark background.

recommendations.title: Reserve Space for Ads
recommendations.description: Set fixed height containers for dynamic ad slots to prevent content jumping.

recommendations.title: Update Footer Colors
recommendations.description: Lighten the text color of footer links to meet WCAG AA standards.
